page.title: 07HOME LIFE_FOOD_CORNISH
page.content: {SURVEY ON CORNISH PASTIES 90% Shortcrust Pastry:10% Rough Puff Pastry:50% make pastry day before:50% when pastry is made.All use pasty meat from the butcher _ chuck steak ( 20% sometimes use pork) {VARIATION ON SIZE OF MEAT 10%=2cm cube:20%=1.5cm:70%=1cm {VEGETABLES INCLUDED 100% Potato:100% onion(diced):80% turnip(70% sliced finely,30% diced). All added salt & pepper.10% OXO.40% butter or marg.90% use milk,10% use egg to glaze The pasty was introduced as an ideal meal for the Tin miner. There were 3 parts (i) Savoury section (ii) Sweet section(iii) Pastry handle(not usually eaten).Today the savoury pasty is the traditional one made in homes and factories,but all are as 'filling' as they were designed to be.
